title: eTula gaapaaDudhuvO
sahitya:
eTula gApaDuduvO shrI rAmacandra nA



anupallavi



eTula gApADuduvO raghuvIra maTumAya samsAramandu daligina nAn-



caraNam 1



anudinamunu dAra tanaya vargAdula pAlanamu jEyuTa koraku

dhanamulu galigina manujula

     bogaDi Arjincina paikamula jUci tanaku sarilEdani biguvuna

dirigina nAn-



caraNam 2



kAyaja janaka nA prAyamu lellanu mAyA pUritulaina

dayAdulacEta sAyaparyantamu

     kAya klEshamu jenda nAyenugAni maunidhyEya ninnu deliyalEni

nAn-



caraNam 3



satamani bAndhavula jatanu nammi madiki hitavulEka O

patitapAvana santatamu

     tyAgarAjasahita sura nikara pUjita ninnE sharaNu jOccitigAni

rAma nAn-
